column4: How can i make a copy of my hard drive into another one bigger?
you can use the dd command to clone a drive or make a backup
it will clone your hard drive contents to the new one and if for some reason the partition is smaller you can just use gparted to resize it to the full size of your new hard drive
i have never tried to clone a hard drive that isn't the same size. It will not hurt to try and see what happendeds. You always have your first hard drive as backup to try again :)
